official_title: A bill to modify the project for navigation improvements in Mobile Harbor, Theodore Ship Channel, Alabama, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Modifies the Theodore Ship Channel navigation project, Alabama, to provide for non-Federal contribution to the costs of spoil sites. Waives such requirement if the Environmental Protection Agency Administrator finds: (1) that the State and other parties are participating in an approved plan for waste treatment facilities; and (2) that applicable water quality standards are not being violated.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for navigation improvements in Mobile Harbor, Theodore Ship Channel, Alabama, and for other purposes.
